attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it illegal for councils to alter the collection of non-recyclable household waste from weekly to fortnightly, or to charge for non-recyclable waste by weight collected, without a substantial reduction in council tax, combined with a local referendum.

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a call to action, not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
